museumTitle: Museum of Black Civilizations - Dakar Slush'D
featuredArtworksDesc: Discover a selection of our most remarkable pieces
exploreDesc: Dive into the rich and diverse world of Black civilizations. Each artwork tells a story, each visit is a discovery.
regionDesc: Discover artworks organized by their region of origin
scanDescription: Scan the QR codes of the artworks to access complete descriptions in French, English and Wolof
scanFeature: Scan the QR codes present on the museum's artworks to instantly access complete descriptions, explanatory audios and videos.
regionDescription: Discover artworks organized by their region of origin
collectionDescription: Explore our complete collection of art and history of Black civilizations
aboutDesc: Discover the history and mission of the Museum of Black Civilizations
missionText: The Museum of Black Civilizations, one of the largest cultural spaces in Senegal and Africa, houses an invaluable heritage wealth. As part of Dakar Slush'D (October 9-10, 2025), Senstartup organizes this exclusive hackathon to rethink the visit experience through digital and democratize access to the museum's cultural content.
historyText: Founded in 2024, our digital museum represents the evolution of traditional cultural institutions towards the digital age. We combine the richness of physical collections with the infinite possibilities of digital to make art accessible to all.
